title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When trying to create a JAR file, pressing finish results in a 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' error.
OB: When trying to create a JAR file, a 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' error is displayed after pressing finish.
EB: When trying to create a JAR file, it should successfully create the JAR without encountering any error related to unsaved editors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the JAR packager. 
2. Add files to be included in the JAR. 
3. Make sure there are some unsaved editors open. 
4. Press the finish button to create the JAR. 
5. Note the displayed error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
